plugins.prepareCmd: echo ${nextRelease.version} > src/interfaces/tui/VERSION && sed -i 's/^version = "[^"]*"/version = "${nextRelease.version}"/' src/interfaces/tui/Cargo.toml && cd src/interfaces/tui && cargo update --workspace && cd ../../../packages/npm-shim && npm version ${nextRelease.version} --no-git-tag-version --allow-same-version
